title: Moving Stones Until Consecutive - Brainteaser - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Three stones are on a number line at positions a, b, and c.
Each turn, you pick up a stone at an endpoint (ie., either the lowest or highest position stone), and move it to an unoccupied position between those endpoints.  Formally, let's say the stones are currently at positions x, y,

title: Nim Game - Brainteaser - Easy - LeetCode
content:
You are playing the following Nim Game with your friend: Initially, there is a heap of stones on the table.
You and your friend will alternate taking turns, and you go first.
